title: Find your lost theory test pass certificate number

details.description: Find your theory test pass certificate number if you have lost yours and need it to book or manage your practical test
details.more_information:
To find your lost theory test pass certificate number you'll need your:

- valid Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
- date of birth

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice") for the Driving Standards Agency before you start.
details.introduction: You can find your theory test pass certificate number if you've lost your original letter - you'll need it when you book your practical test, and might need it if you change or cancel your practical test.

tags.title: Driving tests and learning to drive
